special_text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 red and blue Faerie creature token with flying, haste, and “Whenever this token deals combat damage to an opponent, sacrifice it, draw a card, then discard a card.”
[-2]: When you cast your second spell this turn, copy it and you may choose new targets for the copy.
[-6]: Until end of turn, whenever you cast a spell, draw two cards and add four mana of any one color.
